item.title: Dragon Ball: Sparking! ZERO DLC ‘DAIMA Character Pack 2’ launches September 24
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Goku, Vegeta, Majin Duu, and Gomah.

Dragon Ball: Sparking! ZERO downloadable content “DAIMA Character Pack 2″ will launch on September 24, publisher Bandai Namco and developer Spike Chunsoft announced. Early access will begin September 21 at 3:00 p.m. PT / 6:00 p.m. ET alongside the release of a new update.

The pack will include the following six characters:

  • Goku (Mini) Super Saiyan 4
  • Goku (Daima) Super Saiyan 4
  • Vegeta (Daima) Super Saiyan 3
  • Majin Duu
  • Third Eye Gomah
  • Giant Gomah

Dragon Ball: Sparking! ZERO is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam, and is coming to Switch 2 and Switch on November 14.

Watch a new trailer below.

DLC “DAIMA Character Pack 2” Trailer

English

Japanese



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/dragon-ball-sparking-zero-dlc-daima-character-pack-2-launches-september-24

item.title: Team Reptile announces ‘extreme trick and graffiti game’ HYPERFUNK for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC

"Two seconds per second of evolved funkstyle."

Bomb Rush Cyberfunk developer Team Reptile has announced HYPERFUNK, an “extreme trick and graffiti game” coming to unspecified consoles and PC via Steam. A release date was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

HYPERFUNK is two seconds per second of evolved funkstyle. Battle rival crews, hang out online, explore the city, do some crazy tricks, and blast through the streets.

HYPERFUNK is an extreme trick and graffiti game from a bright future. Society is shaped by the effects of the Hyper, the online space, as various graffiti crews compete in reality with style and ideology of how to interpret this new world. Use your skates, skateboard or BMX to do tricks that fuel your personal boostpack. The higher your combo score, the faster you can boost, up to ridiculous speeds.

Key Features

  • Dynamic Style Wars, crews can take over areas and compete with others on their own.
  • Challenge other crews to a graffiti battle, where you will compete in real time on who can bomb the streets best, escape police and claim the area.
  • Strategically use four different types of graffiti to go over your opponents. Tags < Throwies < Pieces < Blockbusters.
  • Move freely around the city to grow your crew, find music tracks and unlock the other move styles.
  • Meet random online players in the Hyper or hang out online with your friends in the streets.

Watch the announcement teaser trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Teaser Trailer

Screenshots

  • ❮
  • ❯


https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/team-reptile-announces-extreme-trick-and-graffiti-game-hyperfunk-for-pc

item.title: VIractal: World of Viractalia now available in Early Access
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Full release due out in "just under six months."

Board game-style RPG VIractal: World of Viractalia is now available in Early Access for PC via Steam for $14.99, developer Sting announced.

The Early Access release includes the following core features:

  • Exploration and card-based battles on procedurally generated board-style maps.
  • Support for both solo play and online cooperative multiplayer.
  • A deck-building battle system where players construct decks before entering combat.
  • Multiple base stages and a variety of enemy types.
  • Unlockable features earned through post-battle rewards.
  • A collection system that allows players to store and view discovered game pieces.
  • Future updates will expand the game with additional characters, stages, cards, events, and more.

The full release, due out in “just under six months,” will add the following content:

  • New stages featuring previously unseen monsters.
  • New playable characters with unique skill cards.
  • Additional NPCs and related event interactions.
  • Expanded content tailored for cooperative multiplayer.
  • Unlockable items and reward systems.

Here is the roadmap of planned updates:

■ Roadmap

October 2025 – Update #1: “Skyharmonia”

The mystical stage “Skyharmonia,” covered in clouds and ice, will be the setting for your next adventure. With new characters and cards, the strategies at your disposal will expand even further!

  • New stage “Stage 2,” themed around clouds and ice.
  • Various feature updates.
  • New character added.
  • New memos.
  • New cards for existing characters.
  • New events.

November 2025 – Update #2: “Demon Lord’s Castle”

The Demon Lord’s castle, standing in a land of molten lava, becomes the climactic stage. Here, the final battle against the Demon Lord awaits! New characters, objects, and items will broaden your playstyle, while user interface improvements will make the game even smoother to enjoy.

  • New stage “Stage 3,” set in fiery volcanoes and a dark castle.
  • New character added.
  • Introduction of new alchemy cards.
  • New objects to expand strategic options.
  • User interface / user experience improvements.
  • New memos.
  • New events.
  • New items.

December 2025 – Update #3: “???”

Details remain a secret for now, but this stage will play a key role in unraveling the hero’s journey. And for the first time, a guest character will appear—carrying a very familiar giant sword…!

  • A mysterious new stage, “Stage ???”
  • First guest character (Ver.1) joins the game.
  • New character added.
  • New achievements.
  • New memos.
  • New events.

From January 2026 and Beyond

Even after the major updates, we’ll keep rolling out smaller updates, adding new characters and reflecting player feedback. Once all planned content is complete, we aim to move toward the official release!

  • Continuous addition of new characters.
  • Guest Character Version 2 scheduled to join.


https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/viractal-world-of-viractalia-now-available-in-early-access
